Hi, im just trying the last version of soure code(30905), when MainMap.MapType= GMapType.Satellite; the control only shows a black screen and the marker; but in Map type everything is ok; compilyng in VS2008 and win7.

the precompiled version   1.1.3.7 has the same issue, any ideas?.
thanks
google again increased version number, now its VersionGoogleSatellite = "36", but thats not all good news, they switch from PNG, to JPG images on Satellite, so need to fix that google mess...
cool ;] terrain maps converted to jpg too ;D
but still working in my xp system, but not in vista and win7
i fix it, should be ok now
